docs.text: synopsis : it's 1977 in a small italian american neighborhood in new york .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: disco music is popular , and the sexual revolution is on , but the people of new york are not happy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in fact , they're terrified .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as in spike lee's do the right thing a heat wave has the city in its grip , and peoples' tempers are flaring .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the cool of night offers no respite : the neighborhood is being terrorized by a nocturnal psychotic killer who calls himself the son of sam .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: no one knows who the son of sam is , and no one is safe .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: all around new york people are different .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: aside from cultural groupings and ethnic neighborhoods there are differences between individuals .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the italian american section of town a philandering husband named vinny ( john leguizamo ) tries to hide his trysts and sexual behavior from his long suffering newlywed wife dionna ( mira sorvino ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: vinny's friend ritchie ( adrien brody ) hates disco , works at a gay strip club and doesn't want any of the neighborhood folks to know .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ritchie's girl ruby ( jennifer esposito ) is trying to escape a reputation as a slut .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: everyone's different , but nobody in the film wants to be framed as " alien " to the community .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: unfortunately , the killings help create a climate of suspicion pits neighbor against neighbor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: opinion : director spike lee's summer of sam is not about a psycho killer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nor is it about cops trying to apprehend him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's about differences and how , given the right conditions , even close neighbors can fan the hostile flames of irrational suspicion .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one thing i found interesting in summer of sam was the use of sex .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in other movies sex is glamorized .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for example , james bond gets a sexual reward for winning .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: or boring made-for-video " suspense " movies are spiked with gratuitous lingerie scenes just to keep the audience awake .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and every movie or soap opera character in these flicks seems to have expert sexual prowess .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not so with summer of sam .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in a very gutsy move director spike lee shows sex without fantasy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sex is there , but it isn't gratuitous or titillating .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in fact , some of the main characters are downright lousy in bed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sex is in the film because ( sexual ) deviance is part of the film's major theme of " difference " breeding hostility .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in my opinion this kind of movie sex is cutting edge for 1999 , as rare and thought-provoking in american cinema as showing a spanking .
docs.label: positive
